description: 从数据库中查询告警数据

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env = '$ENV'
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  count(fingerprint) as "慢查询"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "数据库慢查询"
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  count(fingerprint) as "连接数高"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "数据库连接数高"
ORDER BY startsAt

links.title: 应用服务告警数量看板

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(fingerprint) as "CPU高"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "应用CPU高"
ORDER BY startsAt

  count(fingerprint) as "内存高"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "应用内存高"
ORDER BY startsAt

  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null

  and env='$ENV'

  and env='$ENV'

  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "OBS延迟高"
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  count(fingerprint) as "ES"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "ES"
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  count(fingerprint) as "K8S相关告警"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "K8S"
  ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  count(fingerprint) as "成功率"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "ELB"
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "KAFKA"
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  count(fingerprint) as "K8S相关告警"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") = "active"
  and env='$ENV'  
  and category = "其他"
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  startsAt AS "告警开始时间",
  JSON_EXTRACT(labels, "$.severity") as '告警级别',
  JSON_EXTRACT(labels, "$.alertname") as '告警名称',
  description as "告警详情",
  valuess as "告警值大小",
  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.state") as '告警状态',
  endsAt as "告警结束时间"
FROM alertmanager
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(startsAt)
  and JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and env='$ENV'  
ORDER BY startsAt desc

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
where
startsAt > str_to_date(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') 
and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and env='$ENV'  
;

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
where
 JSON_EXTRACT(lower(labels), lower("$.severity"))='critical'
 and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
AND startsAt > str_to_date(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')  
  and env='$ENV'  
;

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
where 
 JSON_EXTRACT(lower(labels), lower("$.severity"))='warning'
 and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
 AND startsAt > str_to_date(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')   
  and env='$ENV'  
 ;

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
where 
 JSON_EXTRACT(lower(labels), lower("$.severity"))='info'
 and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
 AND startsAt > str_to_date(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')   
  and env='$ENV'  
 ;

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(startsAt,'1h',0) as 'time',
  count(fingerprint) as 'value'
FROM alertmanager
where $__timeFilter(startsAt)
and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and env='$ENV'  
group by time;

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
where  
   env='$ENV'  
  and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
;

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
where  
 JSON_EXTRACT(lower(labels), lower("$.severity"))='critical' 
 and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
    and env='$ENV'  

;

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
where 
 JSON_EXTRACT(lower(labels), lower("$.severity"))='warning' 
  and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and env='$ENV'  
;

SELECT
  count(fingerprint)
FROM alertmanager
where 
 JSON_EXTRACT(lower(labels), lower("$.severity"))='info'
  and  JSON_EXTRACT(statusss, "$.silencedBy[0]") is null 
  and env='$ENV'  
;
